question: Coderblock SRL CES 2024 product highlight and specification

response.query: Coderblock SRL CES 2024 product highlight and specification

results.title: CES 2024: Coderblock e l'Innovazione Italiana nell'AI Metaverse - Adnkronos
results.content: Tech&games CES 2024 Le startup italiane del CES 2024 presenti anche sulla piattaforma di Coderblock 11 gennaio 2024 | 16.45 Redazione Adnkronos LETTURA: 2 minuti L'AI Metaverse italiana...
results.raw_content:
CES 2024
Le startup italiane del CES 2024 presenti anche sulla piattaforma di Coderblock
L’AI Metaverse italiana presenta a Las Vegas le
opportunità della propria realtà e farà da palcoscenico digitale alla community italiana per massimizzare il know-how tecnologico italiano
All'evento di innovazione più importante del mondo, il Consumer Technology Association – CES 2024, Coderblock rappresenterà l'Italia con il suo rivoluzionario AI Metaverse. Questa piattaforma sarà il fulcro dell'attenzione dal 9 al 12 gennaio a Las Vegas, dove Coderblock si unirà ad altre 50 startup in quella che è considerata una ribalta essenziale per ridefinire l'industria IT globale.
Coderblock coglierà l'occasione per mostrare le infinite possibilità del proprio universo immersivo. Tra le novità presentate, spiccano una nuova logica di guadagno per il real estate virtuale, che trasforma il mondo virtuale in un asset immobiliare tangibile, e l'anteprima di un videogioco in fase di sviluppo, destinato a diventare un modello innovativo di impatto diretto per il business.
La startup italiana si fa portavoce dell'innovazione Made in Italy, creando un padiglione virtuale all'interno del proprio metaverso. Questo spazio digitale darà alle startup italiane presenti al CES l'opportunità di mostrare i propri prodotti e servizi, esaltando così il know-how tecnologico italiano sul mercato americano.
Danilo Costa, Founder & CEO di Coderblock, sottolinea l'intento dell'iniziativa: massimizzare la visibilità delle startup italiane, valorizzando la comunità italiana e dimostrando le potenzialità del metaverso come catalizzatore di nuove opportunità di business. La presenza di Coderblock al CES 2024 è vista come un passo fondamentale per affermare l'Italia come protagonista dell'evento di Las Vegas e per esplorare nuove frontiere nel miglioramento dell'esperienza cliente, nella fidelizzazione e nell'avvio di nuovi investimenti nel mondo virtuale.
L'AI Metaverse di Coderblock fungerà da palcoscenico digitale per alcuni dei principali attori italiani del settore tecnologico, selezionati dall'Italian Trade Agency. Tra questi, BES TESTTM, Ganiga, Coverride, ArtCentrica, Alert-Genius, Kintana, Sport Business Lab Consultancy, TokNox, INNOVA, Alert Genius e M2TEST Srl presenteranno le proprie innovazioni sia nella realtà fisica che in quella immersiva del metaverso italiano.
SEGUICI SUI SOCIAL

results.title: The Italian startups of CES 2024 also present on the Coderblock ...
results.content: At the world's most important innovation event, the Consumer Technology Association - CES 2024, Coderblock will represent Italy with its revolutionary AI Metaverse.This platform will be the center of attention January 9-12 in Las Vegas, where Coderblock will join 50 other startups in what is considered an essential spotlight to redefine the global IT industry.
results.raw_content:
Italian Post
The Italian startups of CES 2024 also present on the Coderblock platform
The Italian AI Metaverse presents the opportunities of its reality in Las Vegas and will act as a digital stage for the Italian community to maximize Italian technological know-how
At the world’s most important innovation event, the Consumer Technology Association – CES 2024, Coderblock will represent Italy with its revolutionary AI Metaverse. This platform will be the center of attention January 9-12 in Las Vegas, where Coderblock will join 50 other startups in what is considered an essential spotlight to redefine the global IT industry.
Coderblock will take this opportunity to showcase the infinite possibilities of its immersive universe. Among the new features presented, stand out a new earning logic for virtual real estate, which transforms the virtual world into a tangible real estate asset, and the preview of a video game in developmentdestined to become an innovative model with direct impact on business.
The Italian startup becomes spokesperson forMade in Italy innovation, creating a virtual pavilion within its own metaverse. This digital space will give Italian startups present at CES the opportunity to showcase their products and services, thus enhancing Italian technological know-how on the American market.
Danilo Costa, Founder & CEO of Coderblock, underlines the intent of the initiative: to maximize the visibility of Italian startups, enhancing the Italian community and demonstrating the potential of the metaverse as a catalyst for new business opportunities. Coderblock’s presence at CES 2024 is seen as a fundamental step to establish Italy as a protagonist of the Las Vegas event and to explore new frontiers in improving customer experience, loyalty and initiating new investments in the virtual world .
Coderblock’s AI Metaverse will act as a digital stage for some of the main Italian players in the technology sector, selected by the Italian Trade Agency. Among these, BES TESTTM, Ganiga, Coverride, ArtCentrica, Alert-Genius, Kintana, Sport Business Lab Consultancy, TokNox, INNOVA, Alert Genius and M2TEST Srl will present their innovations in both the physical and immersive reality of the Italian metaverse.

results.title: Coderblock's AI Metaverse Set to Revolutionize the Global IT Industry ...
results.content: Coderblock will be showcasing its innovative AI Metaverse at CES 2024, taking place at the Consumer Technology Association event. This will be a key opportunity for Coderblock to demonstrate its immersive universe alongside 50 other startups, with a focus on redefining the global IT industry through the infinite possibilities of its platform.
results.raw_content:
News Ectional
Coderblock’s AI Metaverse Set to Revolutionize the Global IT Industry at CES 2024
Coderblock will be showcasing its innovative AI Metaverse at CES 2024, taking place at the Consumer Technology Association event. This will be a key opportunity for Coderblock to demonstrate its immersive universe alongside 50 other startups, with a focus on redefining the global IT industry through the infinite possibilities of its platform.
Coderblock will also create a virtual pavilion within its metaverse to give Italian startups the opportunity to display their products and services at CES. This initiative aims to enhance Italian technological know-how on the American market and maximize the visibility of Italian startups, thus positioning Italy as a key player in the IT industry.
Danilo Costa, Founder and CEO of Coderblock, emphasizes the intent of the initiative to maximize visibility for Italian startups and demonstrate the potential of the metaverse as a catalyst for new business opportunities. Coderblock’s presence at CES 2024 is seen as a crucial step in establishing Italy as a leading presence at the event and exploring new frontiers in improving customer experience, loyalty, and new investments in the virtual world.
Coderblock’s AI Metaverse will provide a digital stage for select Italian technology companies to showcase their innovations, facilitated by the Italian Trade Agency. These companies include BES TESTTM, Ganiga, Coverride, ArtCentrica, Alert-Genius, Kintana, Sport Business Lab Consultancy, TokNox, INNOVA, Alert Genius

results.title: Coderblock to represent Italy at CES 2024: showcasing the potential of ...
results.content: Jan 11, 2024 Coderblock, a revolutionary AI Metaverse platform from Italy, will represent the country at the world's most important innovation event, Consumer Technology Association - CES 2024 in Las Vegas. From January 9-12, the platform will showcase its infinite possibilities and join 50 other startups to redefine the global IT industry.
results.raw_content:
News Puk
Coderblock to represent Italy at CES 2024: showcasing the potential of AI Metaverse for business and innovation
Coderblock, a revolutionary AI Metaverse platform from Italy, will represent the country at the world’s most important innovation event, Consumer Technology Association – CES 2024 in Las Vegas. From January 9-12, the platform will showcase its infinite possibilities and join 50 other startups to redefine the global IT industry.
During the event, Coderblock will demonstrate new virtual property monetization logic that turns a virtual world into a tangible asset and provide an overview of a video game in development with a direct business impact. As a spokesperson for Made in Italy innovation, Coderblock will create a virtual pavilion within its own metaverse for Italian startups present at CES to showcase their products and services, promoting Italian technological know-how in the American market.
Coderblock’s founder and CEO, Danilo Costa, emphasizes that this initiative is aimed at maximizing the visibility of Italian startups and improving the Italian community while demonstrating the potential of the metaverse as a catalyst for new business opportunities. The presence at CES 2024 is a significant step towards establishing Italy as a protagonist at the event and exploring new frontiers in improving user experience, loyalty and driving new investments in the virtual world.
The Italian Trade Agency has selected several major players from Italy’s technology sector to present their innovations both in physical reality and in Italian metaverse during CES 2024. Some of these include BES TESTTM, Ganiga, Coverride, ArtCentrica, Alert-Genius, Quintana, Sport Business Lab Consultanci
